backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a chatroom backend with message storage, user profiles, reactions, access control, blob storage integration, and HTTP outcalls. Includes chatroom CRUD operations, message handling with replies, active user tracking, and password-protected deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two UI styling features: converting category labels to lowercase and matching category tag styling to LIVE badges, both targeting ChatroomCard.tsx and LobbyPage.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing component functionality, including routing, query hooks, UI components, styling, and page-level logic with specific implementation details.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tags for mobile support, cache-busting directives, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for avatar selection supporting file upload, Giphy GIF search with debouncing and trending results, avatar removal, and user initials fallback.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list filtering out Creator messages without media, reply functionality, message highlighting, and auto-scroll on new messages.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating new chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload/URL input for images, YouTube/Twitch videos, and Twitter posts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, username editing, avatar picker, and back-to-lobby navigation for chatroom views.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component; authentication is explicitly not used in this anonymous app.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, pin/unpin controls, reply functionality, and embedded YouTube/Twitch/Twitter media or voice message playback.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component supporting text messages, image uploads, video URLs (YouTube/Twitch), Twitter URLs, and voice recording with progress indicators and validation.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in an iframe with an unpin button for the chatroom.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider for voice messages. Handles audio playback state, metadata loading, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until a specified delay period has passed without changes. Returns the debounced value with a default delay of 300ms.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Custom React hook that ensures chatroom data is fresh on first load by purging stale/empty cache entries and forcing a refetch when the actor becomes ready. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal and resets on actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle. Provides identity state, login status, and authentication methods to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatroom operations including fetching, searching, filtering by category, creating, joining, leaving, and managing messages/reactions. Handles username/userId persistence in localStorage and provides mutations for all chat-related backend operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-optimized viewport handling, and custom styling for voice message player range inputs. Includes iOS-specific input font-size fixes to prevent zoom.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration, defining the API key and result limit for GIF searches.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function that formats numbers into compact notation (k, M, B) for display, handling both number and bigint types.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas, preserving orientation and only returning compressed version if smaller than original.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM manipulation, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage with filtering and bulk operations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Displays a single chatroom page with loading states, error handling, and automatic view count incrementing. Renders ChatArea component when chatroom data is successfully loaded.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page that displays a searchable, filterable list of chatrooms with category badges. Includes client-side filtering, debounced search, and a create chatroom dialog.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file indicating pending feature requests to convert category labels to lowercase and match category tag styling (padding, font size) to existing LIVE indicator badges.
